summary: The summer Lars turned 12, he still feels he should stay away from the girls, but the prostitute Lill teaches him to dance tango. He also have an uncle with a motorbike.
cast: Magnus E. Haslund|Joachim Calmeyer|Anne Krigsvoll|Peder Hamdahl Naess|Anne Marie Ottersen|Frode Rasmussen|Espen Skjønberg|Nils Ole Oftebro|Johan Kjelsberg|Grete Nordrå|Odd Torgeir Pedersen
title: Lars i porten
